name: Subterplane
description:
In Subterplane you control an RC plane attempting to explore a gloomy cave. Try to make it as far as possible without crashing. The further you go, the darker and narrower it gets. Watch your speed and try not to stall!

Luckily, you managed to get a good deal in bulk RC planes, so you can always try again if you do crash. Or, you can explore a new cave.

Good Luck!

Controls:

Left / Right: Steer

Up / Down: Thrust / Brake

Subterplane was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48 (Deeper and deeper).
